verbs.description: [ARG1: President Donald Trump] [V: took] [ARG2: to Twitter] [ARGM-TMP: Monday] [ARGM-PRP: to wish everyone a happy Memorial Day] , and added that the soldiers who died in the line of duty would be proud of his accomplishments .
